headline: GOP has an 'epic opportunity' for Senate dominance over the next two cycles  here's how Dems could fight back
author: Matthew Chapman
sentences: On Tuesday, Axios analyzed how Republicans have the potential for huge gains in the Senate over the next two cycles  but also how Democrats could get an opening to prevent it.
Jon Tester in Montana ... Joe Manchin in West Virginia ... Sherrod Brown in Ohio ... Bob Casey in Pennsylvania ... Tammy Baldwin in Wisconsin ... Kyrsten Sinema in Arizona.
